name: tm04
effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Calm Mind to a compatible Pokémon. (Gen II: Rollout Gen I: Whirlwind)

flavor_text.black-white: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user quietly focuses its mind and calms its spirit to raise its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def stats.
